dcterms:description: Dataset containing images of Vitis vinifera ssp. vinifera cultivars 'Riesling' and 'Chardonnay' captured at BBCH stage 59, used for phenological growth stage analysis.
dcterms:title: Vitis vinifera ssp. vinifera cultivars 'Riesling' and 'Chardonnay'

dcterms:creator: J. Long
E. Shelhamer
T. Darrell
dcterms:description: Data used for training a Fully Convolutional Network (FCN) for semantic segmentation of inflorescences in grapevine images.
dcterms:title: Inﬂorescence segmentation data

dcterms:creator: R. Roscher
K. Herzog

dcterms:description: Dataset for automated image analysis framework aimed at high-throughput determination of grapevine berry sizes using conditional random fields.
dcterms:title: Flower extraction data

dcterms:creator: O. Ronneberger
P. Fischer
T. Brox
dcterms:description: Image patches used for training the U-Net architecture for biomedical image segmentation, adapted for grapevine inflorescence segmentation.
dcterms:title: Image patches for training the FCN

B. Millan

dcterms:description: Annotated dataset for inflorescence segmentation, used for estimating grapevine flower counts through artificial vision techniques.
